chinese: 我將我享、維羊維牛、維天其右之。儀式刑文王之典、日靖四方。伊嘏文王、既右享之。我其夙夜、畏天之威、于時保之。
english: I have brought my offerings,A ram and a bull.May Heaven accept them!I imitate and follow and observe the statutes of king Wen,Seeking daily to secure the tranquillity of hte kingdom.King Wen, the Blesser,Has descended on the right and accepted [the offerings].Do not I, night and day,Revere the majesty of Heaven.Thus to preserve [their favour]?
